books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A former criminal attorney who has been acquitted of his wife’s murder retreats to his family estate on a rocky New England cliff, where he is comforted by the house’s caretaker amid continuing danger.
books.name: WHISKEY BEACH

books.author: by H. M. Ward
books.description: A young woman goes to bed with a sexy man, but complications ensue. The first in a series.
books.name: DAMAGED

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: The forensic sculptor Eve Duncan undertakes a job for a man with dark secrets; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: TAKING EVE

books.author: by Rachel Van Dyken
books.description: Jake, a Seattle millionaire, asks his formerly estranged childhood friend Kacey to pretend to be engaged to him. But she reckoned without Jake’s brother, Travis.
books.name: THE BET

books.author: by Katy Evans
books.description: Remington Tate, the star of the dangerous underground fighting circuit, sets a woman’s mind ablaze and her body on fire with wanting.
books.name: REAL

books.author: by Christina Lauren
books.description: A Wall Street bad boy starts wondering whether the finance whiz Sara Dillon is somebody for him outside the bedroom. A sequel to “Beautiful Bastard.”
books.name: BEAUTIFUL STRANGER

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Six years after the woman he loved married another man, Jake Fisher discovers that neither she nor their life together were what theyseemed, and he sets out to uncover the truth.
books.name: SIX YEARS

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: Two sisters are threatened by a dark secret from their family’s past.
books.name: DADDY'S GONE A HUNTING

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: Hank Cooper inherits a beachfront property in Thunder Point, Ore., and finds himself with a community’s destiny in his hands.
books.name: THE WANDERER

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: While Alex Cross pursues a Washington serial killer (or killers?), someone is after him.
books.name: ALEX CROSS, RUN

books.author: by Michael Robotham
books.description: The clinical psychologist Joe O’Loughlin and the ex-cop Vincent Ruiz persuade the police to reopen the investigation into the fate of two popular teenage girls who disappeared years earlier.
books.name: SAY YOU'RE SORRY

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch links the bullet from a recent crime to the killing of a young female photographer during race riots in 1992.
books.name: THE BLACK BOX

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The military investigator John Puller probes his aunt’s mysterious death in Florida.
books.name: THE FORGOTTEN

books.author: by Kate Atkinson
books.description: A woman appears in different versions of the same events, centered on World War II.
books.name: LIFE AFTER LIFE
